name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PicTab: Beautiful Wallpapers for Every Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a beautiful wallpaper and your goals when opening a tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PicTab: Transform Your New Tab Experience

Elevate your browsing routine with PicTab, a Chrome extension designed to turn every new tab into a stunning visual journey. Immerse yourself in breathtaking, high-quality wallpapers that refresh with every tab you open, creating an ever-changing backdrop that reflects your unique style and preferences.

🌟 Key Features
🖼️ Breathtaking Wallpapers: Enjoy a fresh, captivating image each time you open a new tab, handpicked to deliver a visual treat.
🔄 Flexible Rotation: Customize how often your wallpaper changes—set it to rotate periodically or switch it up manually.
🎨 Personalized Themes: Tailor your wallpaper selection by entering search terms that match your mood or interests.
ℹ️ Informative Details: Discover the story behind each wallpaper, with credits and location information available at a glance.
🎯 Remember Your Goals: Keep your priorities front and center with the "Things to Remember" feature, allowing you to add personal notes or goals directly on your new tab page.

💛 Why Choose PicTab?
PicTab isn't just about aesthetics—it's a tool designed to inspire and motivate. Whether you're aiming to stay focused on your goals or simply want to enjoy a more beautiful browsing experience, PicTab offers a refreshing blend of functionality and style. Transform your new tab into a personalized space that reflects who you are and what you aspire to achieve.

Get PicTab today and make every new tab a source of inspiration.
